name: Urban Battle Simulator
description:
--- best played in fullscreeen mode ---

How to play:
- Select unit type
- Left click in your starting zone to place a unit
- Right click near a unit to remove it
- Click "start battle" when you're ready
- Enjoy the show

Mouse controls:
- Hold middle mouse button and move to rotate and tilt camera
- Mouse wheel to zoom
- Move mouse pointer to the edges of the screen to move camera

Keyboard controls:
- w/a/s/d to move camera
- q/e to rotate camera
- r/f to tilt camera
- t/g to zoom

Grandfather of this game:

the turn based real time strategy game prototype 6 APM
